TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit CLSID extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 當做 COM 類別 (Class) 之全域唯一識別項 (GUID) 的包裝函式。

span.span: Serves as a wrapper for a globally unique identifier (GUID) for a COM class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks CLSID 結構包裝 COM 類別識別碼 (CLSID) 結構，以做為特定的 COM 類別的唯一識別碼。The CLSID structure wraps the COM class identifier (CLSID) structure, which serves as a unique identifier for a specific COM class. CLSID 是一樣的 GUID 是全域唯一識別碼的縮寫的類別識別項的縮寫。CLSID is an abbreviation for class identifier, in the same way that GUID is an abbreviation for globally unique identifier. 這兩個縮寫，請參閱統計可能性很低，以便可以做為唯一的識別項中使用所有電腦和網路上被複製的 128 位元整數。Both abbreviations refer to a 128-bit integer with a low statistical likelihood of being duplicated so that it can be used as a unique identifier across computers and networks. 一般而言，這個識別項會表示為 16 成員的位元組陣列，或以特殊格式字串 （其中的字元 a-f 或 A-F，表示十進位數字 10 至 15） 的十六進位數字。Typically, this identifier is represented either as a 16-member array of bytes or as a specially formatted string of hexadecimal digits (where the characters a-f, or A-F, represent the decimal numbers 10-15). 這個字串表示法包含任一 32 個連續十六進位數字或 8、 4、 4、 4 和 12 的十六進位數字、 連字號分隔的群組。This string representation consists of either 32 contiguous hexadecimal digits or of groups of 8, 4, 4, 4, and 12 hexadecimal digits, separated by hyphens. 連字號連接的字串表示法也可以放在括號或大括號 ({})。The hyphenated string representation optionally can be enclosed in parentheses or braces ({}). 如需詳細資訊：For more information: - 相關的唯一識別碼以及其格式，請參閱。About unique identifiers and their format, see . - 使用 CLSID 結構和 Microsoft Management Console (MMC) 進行程式設計，請參閱[MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。Programming with the CLSID structure and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).
